org.apache.catalina.ant

类 StartTask

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class StartTask
extends AbstractCatalinaCommandTask
    Ant task that implements the /start command, supported by the Tomcat manager application.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.1
    作者:
    Craig R. McClanahan
